Wedge Antilles.INFO: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

Garven Dreis.INFO: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

Biggs Darklighter.INFO: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

Luke Skywalker.INFO: When defending, you may change 1 of your %FOCUS% results to a %EVADE% result.

\"Dutch\" Vander.INFO: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2.  The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

Horton Salm.INFO: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

\"Winged Gundark\".INFO: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your %HIT% results to a %CRIT% result.

\"Night Beast\".INFO: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

\"Backstabber\".INFO: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

\"Dark Curse\".INFO: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

\"Mauler Mithel\".INFO: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

\"Howlrunner\".INFO: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

Maarek Stele.INFO: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

Darth Vader.INFO: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

\"Fel's Wrath\".INFO: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

Turr Phennir.INFO: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Soontir Fel.INFO: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

Tycho Celchu.INFO: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

Arvel Crynyd.INFO: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

Chewbacca.INFO: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

Lando Calrissian.INFO: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

Han Solo.INFO: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice.  If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

Kath Scarlet.INFO: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 %CRIT% result.

Boba Fett.INFO: When you reveal a bank maneuver (%BANKLEFT% or %BANKRIGHT%), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

Krassis Trelix.INFO: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Ten Numb.INFO: When attacking, 1 of your %CRIT% results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

Ibtisam.INFO: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

Roark Garnet.INFO: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

Kyle Katarn.INFO: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

Jan Ors.INFO: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

Captain Jonus.INFO: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

Major Rhymer.INFO: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

Captain Kagi.INFO: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

Colonel Jendon.INFO: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

Captain Yorr.INFO: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

Lieutenant Lorrir.INFO: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the (%BANKLEFT% 1) or (%BANKRIGHT% 1) template instead of the (%STRAIGHT% 1) template.

Tetran Cowall.INFO: When you reveal a %UTURN% maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

Kir Kanos.INFO: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 %HIT% result to your roll.

Carnor Jax.INFO: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

Lieutenant Blount.INFO: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

Airen Cracken.INFO: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.

Colonel Vessery.INFO: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

Rexler Brath.INFO: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

Etahn A'baht.INFO: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its %HIT% results to a %CRIT% result.

Corran Horn.INFO: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack.  You cannot attack during the next round.

\"Echo\".INFO: When you decloak, you must use the (%BANKLEFT% 2) or (%BANKRIGHT% 2) template instead of the (%STRAIGHT% 2) template.

\"Whisper\".INFO: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

Wes Janson.INFO: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

Jek Porkins.INFO: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die.  On a %HIT% result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

\"Hobbie\" Klivian.INFO: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

Tarn Mison.INFO: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

Gemmer Sojan.INFO: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

Keyan Farlander.INFO: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your %FOCUS% results to %HIT%results.

Captain Oicunn.INFO: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

Prince Xizor.INFO: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled %HIT% or %CRIT% result instead of you.

Serissu.INFO: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

Munitions Failsafe.INFO: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

Stygium Particle Accelerator.INFO: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

Advanced Cloaking Device.INFO: TIE Phantom only.%LINEBREAK%After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

Combat Retrofit.INFO: GR-75 only.%LINEBREAK%Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

B-Wing/E2.INFO: B-Wing only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %CREW% upgrade icon.

Countermeasures.INFO: %LARGESHIPONLY%%LINEBREAK%At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round.  Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

Experimental Interface.INFO: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

Autoth???.INFO: This card has not yet been revealed.

Slave I.INFO: Firespray-31 only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %TORPEDO% upgrade icon.

Millennium Falcon.INFO: YT-1300 only.%LINEBREAK%Your action bar gains the %EVADE% action icon.

Moldy Crow.INFO: HWK-290 only.%LINEBREAK%During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

ST-321.INFO: Lambda-class Shuttle only.%LINEBREAK%When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

Royal Guard TIE.INFO: TIE Interceptor only.%LINEBREAK%You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1).%LINEBREAK%You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "4" or lower.

Dodonna's Pride.INFO: CR90 fore section only.%LINEBREAK%When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

A-Wing Test Pilot.INFO: A-Wing only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains 1 %ELITE% upgrade icon.%LINEBREAK%You cannot equip 2 of the same %ELITE% Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

Tantive IV.INFO: CR90 fore section only.%LINEBREAK%Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional %CREW% and 1 additional %TEAM% upgrade icon.

Bright Hope.INFO: GR-75 only.%LINEBREAK%A reinforce action assigned to your fore section adds 2 %EVADE% results (instead of 1).

Quantum Storm.INFO: GR-75 only.%LINEBREAK%At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

Dutyfree.INFO: GR-75 only.%LINEBREAK%When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

Jaina's Light.INFO: CR90 fore section only.%LINEBREAK%When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

Outrider.INFO: YT-2400 only.%LINEBREAK%While you have a %CANNON% Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform %CANNON% secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

Dauntless.INFO: VT-49 Decimator only.%LINEBREAK%After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

Virago.INFO: StarViper only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %SYSTEM% and %ILLICIT% upgrade icons.%LINEBREAK%You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

\"Heavy Scyk\" Interceptor (Cannon).INFO: M3-A Interceptor only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %CANNON%, %TORPEDO%, or %MISSILE% upgrade icon.

\"Heavy Scyk\" Interceptor (Torpedo).INFO: M3-A Interceptor only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %CANNON%, %TORPEDO%, or %MISSILE% upgrade icon.

\"Heavy Scyk\" Interceptor (Missile).INFO: M3-A Interceptor only.%LINEBREAK%Your upgrade bar gains the %CANNON%, %TORPEDO%, or %MISSILE% upgrade icon.

IG-2000.INFO: Aggressor only.%LINEBREAK%You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

BTL-A4 Y-Wing.INFO: Y-Wing only.%LINEBREAK%You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a %TURRET% secondary weapon.
